description: Non-material admendment of planning permission reference P081406 dated 17 October 2008 for the 'Conversion of existing buildings for mixed commercial and residential use comprising one commercial unit (B1) and 17 residential units, including addition of third storey to main building'. The material amendment is to add a condition listing the approved drawings.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Cover letter, site plan, Planning Statement, Design and Access Statement, Energy Strategy, Daylight and Sunlight Report, Environmental Monitoring Form, D1000, D5800, D5210, D5100, D5101, D5102, D5103, D5104, D5500, D5700, D5701, D5702, D1100, D1101, D1102, D1103, D1500, D1700, D1701, D1702, D1200, D1201, D1202, D1203, D1005, D1006, D1007 (LBI REG 14061), Transport Statement, Energy Strategy, and 6052-SK1 (LBI REG 14062).

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
